content.text:
# Rock Ferry (ward)

]]
Rock Ferry (previously Bebington and Mersey, 1973 to 1979, and Tranmere, 1979 to 2004) is a Wirral Metropolitan Borough Council ward in the Birkenhead Parliamentary constituency.
